name: Yu-Ju Lee
bio: I am a software engineer at Verily, focusing on backend development on Google Cloud. I hold a PhD in Computer Science from the University of Colorado Boulder, where my research, under the guidance of Prof. David Hall, applied machine learning to meteorological data for interpretable prediction. Before my PhD, I worked as a systems engineer, designing coexistence architectures for co-located wireless systems, particularly in Wi-Fi technology.
